meanings.sent1: The alley behind the restaurant was the filthiest place in town.
meanings.sent2: After playing in the mud, her clothes were the filthiest they had ever been.
meanings.sent3: The filthiest room in the house was surprisingly the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: His mind felt like the filthiest swamp, filled with dark thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The filthiest water she had ever seen was in the abandoned well.

meanings.sent1: The filthiest windows in the neighborhood belonged to the old house.
meanings.sent2: The dog came back from the park looking the filthiest it had ever been.
meanings.sent3: She joked that his car was the filthiest in the entire parking lot.
meanings.sent4: The filthiest hands she had ever seen belonged to the mechanic.
meanings.sent5: The filthiest blanket in the closet was covered in dust and grime.

meanings.sent1: The filthiest act he could imagine was lying to his best friend.
meanings.sent2: The gossip about her was the filthiest rumor in the small town.
meanings.sent3: His mind felt like the filthiest swamp, filled with dark thoughts.
meanings.sent4: The filthiest lie she ever told was about her own sister.
meanings.sent5: The filthiest behavior at the party was when someone stole the host's wallet.
